algorithm: The new algorithm calculates a heuristic factor by combining the ratio of the standard deviation of daily returns over the last 20 days to the simple moving average of the closing prices over the same period, with an adjustment based on the relative difference between the highest high and lowest low over the past 20 days.
code:
def heuristics_v2(df):
    std_returns_20_day = df['close'].pct_change().rolling(window=20).std()
    sma_close_20_day = df['close'].rolling(window=20).mean()
    high_low_diff_20_day = (df['high'].rolling(window=20).max() - df['low'].rolling(window=20).min()) / sma_close_20_day
    heuristics_matrix = (std_returns_20_day / sma_close_20_day) * (1 + high_low_diff_20_day)
    return heuristics_matrix
